name: RAPID_QUERY
description: This table contains the NoAdd, single response information for the Cosmos Rapid Query (CRQ) masterfile.

columns.name: QUERY_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the query record.

columns.name: QUERY_ID_QUERY_NAME
columns.description: The record name for the query record.

columns.name: QUERY_NAME
columns.description: The record name for the query record.
